title: Is it better to handwrite or type? - Quora

response.answer_text: My best answe is to do what works best for you. I hand write my research notes, It helps me retain it better have to review less. The same for outlines. Wriritng copy or content I type because I am a terrible typist and it forces me to slow down and consider my words more carefully. That being said, I have a friend who ghostwrites non-fiction and he dictates everything and has it transcribed. With time you will find what works best for you at each stage of a project, Roll with it. Part of the beauty of writing is it allows each of us to be ourselves. Part of that is finding our own methods.

It is best to write on a word processor, so mistakes and rewrites are easily taken care of. Second best is to type using erasable paper, if such paper is still available. Third best is to type, and just strike out errors. Fourth best is to handwrite neatly.
